document.full_text: veteran defenseman brian rafalski retired wednesday, walking away from $6 million of guaranteed contract money. in the end, having fun and feeling healthy proved more important.
document.title: rafalski retires, pain trumping money
lines_and_colors: veteran defenseman brian rafalski retired wednesday, walking away from $6 million of guaranteed contract money. in the end, having fun and feeling healthy proved more important.
